casebody.data:
Cleveland Bar Association v. Danner.

[Cite as Cleveland Bar Assn. v. Danner (1994), 68 Ohio St.3d 526.]

*527(No. 93-2174 Submitted January 5, 1994 Decided March 30, 1994.) Robert S. Belovich, Gerald M. Ozan and Paul Morrison, for relator. Per Curiam.

We concur in the findings and recommendation of the board. Respondent, Herbert A. Danner, is hereby indefinitely suspended from the practice of law in Ohio. Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur.
